name: World of Warships — Starter Pack: Ishizuchi
name_original: World of Warships — Starter Pack: Ishizuchi
description:
Have you just started out on your way in World of Warships? Dip your toes in the water with a Premium battleship and a set of sweet bonuses.

This package includes:

  • Ishizuchi, Japanese Tier IV battleship
  • Port slot
  • 11x Epic camouflages
  • 11x common expendable economic bonuses of four types ("Credits +20%," "Ship XP +100%," "Commander XP +100%," and "Free XP +300%")
  • 5x Award containers
